communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) The contract entered into on or around November 20, 2023, including the price and dates, between the Michigan state capitol and ZeroEyes for use of ZeroEyes’ artificial intelligence gun detection software;

2) Any records showing the number of times the ZeroEyes software has raised an alert between its implementation on or around November 20, 2023 and the present; and

3) Any records documenting false positive or false negative alarms raised by the ZeroEyes software during the same period, where a false positive is defined as an event in which the system incorrectly identified a non-weapon object as a weapon and a false negative is defined as an event in which the system failed to detect a weapon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maggie Dougherty
